sub_title: Global Relationship Manager DLL / Head of Wholesale & Rural Privacy Operations at Rabobank
summary: Experienced banker with a demonstrated history of working in several executive mangement roles in the financial industry in both developed and developing countries. Skilled in business, rural and retail banking, mergers & acquisitions , marketing, risk management and process and project management. Strong experience in change / transformation management.  Customer- and result oriented with a drive to build relations between people and departments. Banking professional with a Master of Business Administration (M.B.A.) from Nyenrode University. Passion for banking for food.
